title: sandada007
author: sandada007
content: Hey HELLO to all Dear Crypto TradersI am Mining and Trading Crypto since 2017. There are lot of Telegram Channel who provide free Crypto signals but they all are Cheaters and have no perfect result. Last 2 days i am Just come to know about Website Free Crypto Signals, which is under development and their huge team are planning to provide most accurate Crypto Trading Signals free on website. So if you know some other genuine source for best Trading Signals let me know. THANKS

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: oh please, you have it in the website field on your profile and now you're here making this post look like a user review... yes, thanks for proving to us one more time about how signals aren't worth our time.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Did you just do some lowkey advertising for your trading signal?Remember that using trading signals, even if they claim to be the most accurate, is not a one-size-fits-all strategy to shortcut your trading journey, and they cannot in any way promise you a series of consistent wins. But yeah, if you decided to use it, make sure to take everything with a grain of salt.

comments.author: Zilon
comments.body: Quote from: sandada007 on December 23, 2022, 11:45:27 AMHey HELLO to all Dear Crypto TradersI am Mining and Trading Crypto since 2017. There are lot of Telegram Channel who provide free Crypto signals but they all are Cheaters and have no perfect result. Last 2 days i am Just come to know about Website Free Crypto Signals, which is under development and their huge team are planning to provide most accurate Crypto Trading Signals free on website. So if you know some other genuine source for best Trading Signals let me know. THANKSWe know too well free signals are never 100% free, It's either they plan on cheating their subscribers or they plan on building their channels then start implementing payment plans once they hit their expected target, not that the alone free signals are never accurate most of their speculations are lucky guesses. My question is how come you have trusted a signal service you only met two days ago, and it is already on your profile. This should be a strategized advert for your personal signal service.

comments.author: Questat
comments.body: Perhaps, crypto signals had come free at first but later on, they will collect some money in exchange for their (fake) signals. I'm not sure if you are here just to spread that website OP, I hope you will not cause you will just fail to get our trust. If I were, stop looking for trading signals but instead, continue mining and enjoy it or/ do trading by having your own signals and analysis. In fact, you are right many people give their crypto signals and they all are wrong. You can never expect something will change as it even go worse now.

comments.author: Xxmodded
comments.body: I don't believe yet with some free crypto signal trading, actually after looking with your account level stuck newbie and how come possibility you an expert in cryptocurrency signal trading. Actually free or paid signal trading not recommended for joining right now because they have try with manipulated their member how to buy when the owner paid signal have buy early.I have joined with many kind of paid signal trading cryptocurrency and almost of the owner try to manipulated how to make their member buy late after price have going up.

comments.author: harizen
comments.body: Quote from: sandada007 on December 23, 2022, 11:45:27 AMI am Mining and Trading Crypto since 2017. There are lot of Telegram Channel who provide free Crypto signals but they all are Cheaters and have no perfect result. Last 2 days i am Just come to know about Website Free Crypto Signals, which is under development and their huge team are planning to provide most accurate Crypto Trading Signals free on website. If there is a group signal that can provide a "perfect" and "accurate" result, damn they might have an effective crystal ball predictor that is able to know what will happen in the future and they can withstand the heavy volatility on the crypto market lol.Disregarding OP's intention and advertising the posted shared link, newbies should realize that almost (close to zero) trading group signals offering free signals should not be entertained as aside from it doesn't really can predict what will be the flow of the market (as that was tough to do even for professionals) later on, these groups will offer a paid subscription which doesn't make sense to be purchased at.Remember that real professional traders are too busy with their respective trading works and don't have time to offer such a signal provider.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: Potato Chips on December 23, 2022, 12:01:36 PMoh please, you have it in the website field on your profile and now you're here making this post look like a user review... yes, thanks for proving to us one more time about how signals aren't worth our time.you got it right, just promoting his site more then likely. we all know that most trading signal groups are crap. not really helping traders especially newbies. they are just exhausting your funds for their own gains. so nope i won't suggest any.much better if you will learn your own way in trading. learning slow is better at least, those tricks and tips that you have gained will be your weapon in this market. you won't need to rely on somebody's suggestion. because for sure, you will only get rekt by these people. there is no perfect crypto trading signal that i know of.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: I don't think that you really need one, you're just advertising that link that you've made.Well, nice try and trick. But I'll never click on that and for sure you've seen those folks that have been also asking the same thing about trading signals.Go to them and have a conversation and maybe something will be built upon that.

comments.author: xzy887
comments.body: I will never use your link for my trading. Because if you ever want to be a professional trader then you have to learn everything yourself first. I call it stupid to trade depending on someone. You can be successful in life only if you remove yourself from depending on others and trade according to your own mind. And for that I will not ask you to rely on any Telegram group and any website.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Miserable attempts to promote the site in such ways will give random results. If you want stable visits to the site, make efforts in the content and marketing policies. Otherwise, no one will click on your links.Trading signals depends on the laziness of traders and their reliance on a third party that achieves quick profits for them, which is a fallacy in itself. If you do not develop your investment strategy, you will end up losing.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: sandada007 on December 23, 2022, 11:45:27 AM...So if you know some other genuine source for best Trading Signals let me know. Most owners of such channels earn money by subscribing, not trading. Since it is quite difficult to make money on trading, it is therefore easier and safer to give signals to others. It is for this reason that we see a huge number of offers from those who want to sell their trading signals.

comments.author: fuguebtc
comments.body: Quote from: sandada007 on December 23, 2022, 11:45:27 AMHey HELLO to all Dear Crypto TradersI am Mining and Trading Crypto since 2017. There are lot of Telegram Channel who provide free Crypto signals but they all are Cheaters and have no perfect result. Last 2 days i am Just come to know about Website Free Crypto Signals, which is under development and their huge team are planning to provide most accurate Crypto Trading Signals free on website. So if you know some other genuine source for best Trading Signals let me know. THANKSYou are the owner of it, it is right there in your referral and from what you are saying, it just proves that you are here just for the sake of scam and nothing better. If you want to promote your signal group, be honest and we will evaluate it objectively, with what you are doing, you are smearing the reputation of yourself and your signal group. It is clear to me that this is a group of scam signals, nothing more and nothing less.

comments.author: Sterbens
comments.body: I don't understand why so many people rely on crypto signals for their trading. Isn't that a step that is not quite right, moreover it is done by beginners. It is better to study and develop the strategy that we will use to become a trading strategy. I'm worried that when we start trading relying on free signals, it will make us dependent. Even more worrying when by relying on signals we will be more lazy to study. There are no signals that will give us an advantage, and I'd rather say it's luck if the guess is right.I'm wondering if the OP has any other reasons when questioning this sort of thing, like promoting something?

comments.author: _morghulis
comments.body: Quote from: sandada007 on December 23, 2022, 11:45:27 AMHey HELLO to all Dear Crypto TradersI am Mining and Trading Crypto since 2017. There are lot of Telegram Channel who provide free Crypto signals but they all are Cheaters and have no perfect result. Last 2 days i am Just come to know about Website Free Crypto Signals, which is under development and their huge team are planning to provide most accurate Crypto Trading Signals free on website. So if you know some other genuine source for best Trading Signals let me know. THANKSIf you do not trust the one in your post then why did you put in your profile?Advertising your website like this won't do you any good, you might be able to get few persons to click on the link but that will be the end of the click you won't expect them to come back tomorrow and click on the link again because the reason why they clicked on the link in the first place was because you baited them. So advertising like this does more harm than good to your site. Please look for a better way and stop using click bait.

comments.author: albon
comments.created_time: December 24, 2022, 02:54:01 PMLast edit: December 24, 2022, 03:22:47 PM by albon
comments.body: Quote from: sandada007 on December 23, 2022, 11:45:27 AMHey HELLO to all Dear Crypto TradersI am Mining and Trading Crypto since 2017. There are lot of Telegram Channel who provide free Crypto signals but they all are Cheaters and have no perfect result. Last 2 days i am Just come to know about Website Free Crypto Signals, which is under development and their huge team are planning to provide most accurate Crypto Trading Signals free on website. So if you know some other genuine source for best Trading Signals let me know. THANKSWhere do you know that their team is huge? After reviewing the site of the signal that you mentioned, I did not find any information about the team of analysts who work on this site. I never recommend Telegram channels and unknown sites such as these that offer free signals. You cannot trust them because you do not know Any information about their experience in the field, even if they publish paid signals. As for me, I cannot trust them and pay them because they do not guarantee that I will achieve investment returns from their analysis and signals.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Op looks like he is promoting his signal group hehe  But for me I don't have to rely on such because nothing is perfect with trading. You can't win all trades that you make order into so if this is so, it is better to reduce your risk like activating your stop, I think that will be better than paying for a signal group that you are not sure at the end will be profitable.

comments.author: Jody.Drummer
comments.body: Quote from: fuguebtc on December 24, 2022, 01:17:53 PMQuote from: sandada007 on December 23, 2022, 11:45:27 AMHey HELLO to all Dear Crypto TradersI am Mining and Trading Crypto since 2017. There are lot of Telegram Channel who provide free Crypto signals but they all are Cheaters and have no perfect result. This forum also provides services like this and it's fine when carrying out activities with honesty as priority, after all it's the community that can judge.So OP, don't be offended by the many who say that OP ended up being a fraud, because it was his own actions that made us here speculate like that.Actually, this modus operandi has been carried out by many fraudsters, so it's the wrong place here.

comments.author: fullhdpixel
comments.body: Quote from: tvplus006 on December 24, 2022, 11:42:24 AMQuote from: sandada007 on December 23, 2022, 11:45:27 AM...So if you know some other genuine source for best Trading Signals let me know. Most owners of such channels earn money by subscribing, not trading. Since it is quite difficult to make money on trading, it is therefore easier and safer to give signals to others. It is for this reason that we see a huge number of offers from those who want to sell their trading signals.Trading is difficult for a newbie but once they learn to master it, that must be time that they can make a living out of it. I think trading group can't get a lot of subscribers if the owners itself is not good at trading. We can't say that they will just get their signals from other sources because they still can't identify it if it was a good signal or not.There might be a big number of groups but they are mostly fake. They are only trying their luck to fool newbie traders. Good thing that messaging group such as telegram are now doing an action to to ban those scam groups in their platform. They also got triggered when people call their app a nest of scammers.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Nice try to market that signal site, and wondering for the past 5 years of trading in the market have you learned any trading strategy which can help you not to relay that much on any signals? Well, I’m not here to share any good signal group because I’m not a believer of those signal group and I know that its just a scheme where the top is just taking advantage of every newbies, some signal group are also asking for a big fee, that’s too risky and better not to join any signal at all.
